lines.text: [Krishna has told Karna the truth about his birth and begs him to join the Pandavas in the upcoming Kurukshetra war. Karna turns down the offer, but later that day, he approaches at a temple alone]

O, Creator! Why have I been tormented like this, to learn the truth about my birth? The Sun is still the source of light to the world! My mother is still a respected queen! Yet I, the result of their union, am a wanderer... But I will never give up Duryodhana!
Do you hear me? I will never betray him! He has given me far too much in friendship! I will never betray Duryodhana!
Do you know that I have two sweethearts?
Really? Who are they? If necessary, I will kidnap them to get them for you!
They are not girls, my friend - besides, I can only get one of them and not the other!
It is simple - one is the death of Arjuna, the other is my own death.
